topics.description: Covers fundamental concepts, types of learning (supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement), key challenges, and an overview of the machine learning workflow.
Discusses data loading, cleaning, augmentation, feature engineering, and categorical feature handling, crucial for preparing datasets for model training.
Explores model training, evaluation, hyperparameter tuning, and cross-validation techniques to optimize performance.
Introduces neural networks, activation functions, perceptrons, and multilayer perceptrons as the foundation for deep learning.
Covers convolutional neural networks (CNNs), image classification, object detection, segmentation, and transfer learning.

topics.topic: Time Series Analysis and Sequential Models
topics.description: Focuses on recurrent neural networks (RNNs), LSTMs, GRUs, sequence preprocessing, and time series applications.
Discusses text preprocessing, word embeddings, transformers, sequence-to-sequence models, and attention mechanisms.
Includes GANs, VAEs, style transfer, latent space manipulation, and text generation for creative AI applications.
Covers decision trees, random forests, gradient boosting, and model interpretability for structured data.
Introduces reinforcement learning principles, reward functions, Q-learning, policy gradients, and applications.
Covers gradient descent, stochastic gradient descent (SGD), Adam, learning rate scheduling, and loss functions.
Discusses feature selection, principal component analysis (PCA), t-SNE, and autoencoders for reducing data complexity.
Explores clustering techniques (k-means, DBSCAN), isolation forests, and applications in fraud detection.

topics.topic: Bias, Fairness, and Explainability in AI
topics.description: Addresses ethical concerns, fairness metrics, explainable AI (XAI), and model bias mitigation techniques.
Covers model serialization, serving via APIs, monitoring deployed models, optimizing performance, and edge deployment.

topics.topic: Cloud and Distributed Computing for AI
topics.description: Explores cloud platforms, distributed training, parallelization, and scaling machine learning models.
Discusses leveraging pretrained models, fine-tuning strategies, and domain adaptation for various ML tasks.
Covers Bayesian inference, probabilistic graphical models, and applications in uncertainty estimation.
Introduces quantum computing concepts and their intersection with AI, including quantum neural networks.
Explores emerging technologies, multimodal AI, ethical AI developments, and the impact of AI on society.
